name: Notion Personal Website
description: Share your work with the worldI hate LinkedIn, so when it comes to discovering someone's work, I always try to find their personal website. It's much more than just a resume; it's a way to connect on a deeper level.However, website builders are often complicated to use, and you don't need all their features to create a simple personal website. So when I learned that we could build personal websites on Notion, I was thrilled.This Notion template is the best way to get started! You'll be able to s
features: Blog (+ article template); Notion-powered website; Easy to use; Minimalistic
